Description:
IN 312393067 - You have failed to ensure your employees who are liable to be exposed to mild and stainless-steel weld fume, a substance hazardous to health, have been placed under suitable health surveillance, giving rise to the risk of serious personal ill health, namely lung cancer and occupational asthma.

IN 312393129 - You have failed to adequately control exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely mild and stainless-steel weld fume, which are carcinogens.

IN 312393147 - Effective measures have not been taken to prevent access to the dangerous parts of your 3 bank pillar drill serial number 16797W24 located in the workshop, namely the rotating chuck, which can be accessed by employees whilst in operation.
